text: Randall Bacon is an American actor and former football player."Russell Wilson's commercial body double says he makes six figures" Yahoo! Sports. Retrieved 2018-02-19."We asked football players and financial advisers: How realistic is HBO’s ‘Ballers’?" Market Watch. Retrieved 2018-02-19. Bacon played high school football in Sacramento, California"State Athletes of the Week" Golden State Preps. Retrieved 2018-02-19. before attending college and playing for the Texas A&M; University-Kingsville Javalinas. Following his football career, he transitioned to acting and has performed in TV and film including roles in series like All My Children, The Young and the Restless, Scream Queens, and Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. along with the film Rz-9. Bacon works as a commercial body double for Seattle Seahawks quarterback Russell Wilson."The "other" Russell Wilson" CNBC. Retrieved 2018-02-19. He is part of "The Team That Never Plays" profiled in Sports Illustrated."I’m Not Russell Wilson, But I Play Him on TV" Sports Illustrated.
